snippet: Officials said the arrest of the landlord, Daniel Melamed, was the first from a city-state task force that investigates properties that have generated harassment complaints.
abstract: Brooklyn landlord Daniel Melamed is arrested and charged with range of crimes related to his use of abusive tactics to evict tenants from rent-regulated apartments; city officials characterize arrest as first in series as joint task force cracks down on tenant harassment.
lead_paragraph: Officials said the arrest of the landlord, Daniel Melamed, was the first from a city-state task force that investigates properties that have generated harassment complaints.

headline.main: Brooklyn Landlord Is Arrested in Tenant Harassment Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Landlord Is Arrested in Tenant Harassment Inquiry
